## Un paquet d'R

S'instal·la com qualsevol altre.

![](img/rmd-package.png){style="float:right;" fig-alt="RMarkdown logo." width="300"}

```{r echo = T, eval = F}

                   "knitr", 
                   "DT"))
```

## Code

``` {.r code-line-numbers="2-3"}
install.packages(c("rmarkdown",
                   "knitr", 
                   "DT"))
```

Holi

``` {.r code-line-numbers="2,4"}
install.packages(c("rmarkdown",
                   "dplyr",
                   "ggplot2",
                   "knitr", 
                   "DT"))
```

Holi

``` {.r code-line-numbers="|2|4"}
install.packages(c("rmarkdown",
                   "dplyr",

```
